channel.title: Notice board | Unimi
channel.description: General notice board of the University of Milan "La Statale"

item.title: Filter semester: new start date for enrolment
item.description: The opening of the procedure for enrolling in the filter semester on the UniMi portal has been postponed to Thursday, 10 July 2025 at 15.%0A%0A‚ñ∂Ô∏è Learn more on Unimi.it

item.title: Call for the English language development course in view of the C1 Advanced (CAE) exam - SOLD OUT
item.description: Registration is open for the English language development course with a view to sitting the Cambridge C1 Advanced (CAE) exam. Classes, for the whole duration of 20 hours, are taking place in person in September-October at the SLAM Centre according to the calendar reported in the call.%0A%0AüìÑ Read the call for further details

item.title: Call for the English language development course in view of the B1 Preliminary (PET) exam
item.description: Registration is open for the English language development course with a view to sitting the Cambridge B1 Preliminary (PET) exam. Classes, for the whole duration of 20 hours, are taking place in person in September-October at the University venue in Piazza Sant'Alessandro 1 according to the calendar reported in the call.%0A%0AüìÑ Read the call for further details

item.title: La Statale Mentoring, mentee applications open until 9 July 2025
item.description: Learn about the project that promotes professional orientation for students.%0A%0A‚ñ∂Ô∏è Learn more on Unimi.it

item.title: Italian Erasmus
item.description: Italian Erasmus is a national mobility programme that allows students to carry out mobility periods at other affiliated Italian universities.%0AThe call for applications and all other information are available on the Italian Erasmus page.%0ADeadline for applications: 18th July 2025.%0A

item.title: Extended weekend opening hours at the BICF Library
item.description: Learn about the new hours for the Biology, Chemistry, Physics and Computer Sciences Library ‚Äì BICF.%0A%0A‚ñ∂Ô∏è Learn more on Unimi.it

item.title: Admission to the degree programmes in Medicine, Dentistry, and Veterinary Medicine ‚Äì Academic Year 2025/2026
item.description: Find out how access to these programmes has changed.%0A%0A‚ñ∂Ô∏è Learn more on Unimi.it

item.title: Virgilio Program 2025/26: Ranking list
item.description: The Selection Committee for the Virgilio Program 2025-26 gathered on May 15th 2025 at 12.30 am to screen applications and select applicants. Please find below the final ranking list, including the names of all applicants selected for the Virgilio Program 2025-26. %0A%0AüìÑ Virgilio program - Ranking linst 2025/26

item.title: Dual Career programme for student-athletes
item.description: As of 15 July 2025, students can submit their application for the Dual Career programme, aimed at supporting high-level athletes in balancing their competitive sports commitments with university career.%0A%0A‚ñ∂Ô∏è Learn more on Unimi.it
